name: detector-js
description: DetectorJS, A platform, environment, features detector written in ES6 (based on platform.js & feature.js)

scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && jsdoc -R ./README.md -r -c ./jsdoc.json && echo 'Documentation built in ./docs folder'
scripts.readme: pkg-2-readme package.json > README.md -t "./pkg-2-readme.template.md" && echo 'README.md file built'
scripts.build:release: npm run readme && npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.build:release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build:release
scripts.build:release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build:release
scripts.build:release:major: npm version major && npm run build:release

author: Black Mirror
